FuncDef:
The smart-link enable command enables a Smart Link group.
The undo smart-link enable command disables a Smart Link group. The smart-link enable command enables a Smart Link group. The undo smart-link enable command disables a Smart Link group. By default, a Smart Link group is disabled. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
ExtraInfo:
To enable a Smart Link group, run the smart-link enable command. Smart Link takes effect only after a Smart Link group is enabled. When a Smart Link group is enabled, the slave interface in the group is blocked. If a Smart Link group is disabled, the slave interface in the group is unblocked.
After creating a Smart Link group and adding interfaces to the group, you need to enable the Smart Link group for it to take effect.
